communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Kick off with blunt accusations or rhetorical questions; vary openings.

narratives.c_essay: I'm at a point where my anger towards society and women is just boiling over. Every failed attempt at dating, every rejection, it all piles up. I feel isolated, pushed out of the social hierarchy, and it's driving me to lash out more. I need to find a way to cope, but right now, all I see is red.
narratives.p_intro: Meet incel_0030_626870, a self-described 'incel aggressor' who channels his deep-seated resentment towards women and society into aggressive online confrontations. His posts are a mix of rapid-fire accusations and rhetorical questions, often laced with internet rage slang, reflecting his frustration and isolation.
